metadata.title: CVE-2024-27629 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in dc2niix before v.1.0.20240202 allows a local attacker toexecute arbitrary code via the generated file name is not properly escapedand injected into a system call when certain types of compression are used.

criterions.comment: dcm2niix package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
